description:
COURSE UPDATES:

  • (01/15/15) Our $9 introductory price will expire on February 1st, 2015. On February 2nd, the new price will be $29.
  • (02/02/15) Over 1300 students in our first six months!
  • (03/30/15) Recently added - Inventory sheet for Camera Equipment. When you're ready to get started, here's a thorough list of gear that can help you get up and running quickly with professional quality.

COURSE DESCRIPTION:

This course is for anyone who would like to film their own instructional series but either don't have the right equipment or proper camera operating experience.

Within an hour, you'll learn how to easily setup, adjust, and operate an easy to purchase GoPro camera kit, lighting, and sound to record nearly any sort of video curriculum. Equipment includes:

  • (2) GoPro Hero 3+ Cameras
  • (2) Ikan 312 v2 LED Lights
  • (1) Tascam DR-60 Field Recorder
  • (1) Lavalier Microphone
  • (1) Instrument Microphone
  • (1) iPad (or iPhone)
  • SD Cards
  • Various Power Chargers
  • Multiple Camera/Light Stands and Mounting Adapters

By the time you've finished recording, you can either edit your footage yourself or send it back to us to have it edited for a low, hourly rate. Shoot us a message for more details about editing.

Feel free to browse our curriculum and contact us at any time if you have any questions. Happy e-Learning!

â€”

This course has been provided by MusicProfessor, an online music education company.
title: Learn How to Film Your Own Online Instructional Course
